definitions.text: an itinerant Australian laborer who carries his personal belongings in a bundle as he travels around in search of work
to walk with a lofty proud gait, often in an attempt to impress others
examples: He struts around like a rooster in a hen house

definitions.text: discourage or frighten with threats or a domineering manner; intimidate
act in an arrogant, overly self-assured, or conceited manner
